articles.title: American Airlines cancels more than 1,000 flights over Halloween weekend - New York Post
articles.description: On Sunday, American Airlines canceled 19 percent of all of its planned flights that day, accounting for nearly one-third of all of the country’s cancelations.
articles.content:
American Airlines canceled over 1,000 flights over the Halloween weekend, blaming weather woes and staffing issues.
